metadata.name: Inferno Unmasked
metadata.description:
// AN ARTIST FINDING A WAY //

Let us pull back the mask and unleash the inferno

[[ 3 BURNS FOR 1 ]]  
[[ BUT 1 IS BETTER THAN NONE ]]

As an artist, my inspiration for the collection "Inferno Unmasked" comes from the constantly evolving world of digital art and the growing appreciation for unique and experimental forms of it. As a lover of glitch art, I sought to push the boundaries of what can be achieved in this medium, and to create a collection that would challenge and inspire both myself and the viewer.

This collection is a reflection of my own personal journey of self-discovery, as I strive to grow as an artist and a human being. The imagery, with its static and flashing objects, demonic figures, and the "burn me" theme, is a symbol of my willingness to let go of the past and embrace change, in order to reach new heights in my artistic and personal pursuits.

With "Inferno Unmasked", I hope to not only showcase my love for glitch art, but also to spark a conversation about the ever-evolving world of digital art and the role it plays in personal growth and self-discovery.
